fields.summary: Dev: Merge Studio rubles from master branch to stable

comments.body:
The important ruble file to consider are :
plugins/com.appcelerator.titanium.360.core_1.0.0.*/bundles/appc_mobile.ruble
plugins/com.appcelerator.titanium.core_3.1.2.*/bundles/titanium_mobile.ruble

Those rubles provide the reference for the project samples : Geocoder, RSS Reader, ToDo List, Kitchen Sink, Kitchen Sink nook, Field Service.
